content: this legal text explains the progress of a case involving the division of an estate after someones death the court has determined that the estate should be divided among the heirs including the wife and children the court has identified the properties that make up the estate which include a complex building and agricultural land an expert appointed by the court has prepared a division plan based on the value of the properties which amounts to 99734600 euros the court has approved the division plan and ordered the heirs to pay their respective shares the court has also considered the costs of the case and determined that compensation should be paid in another part of the text a judge has granted an application to award a share of properties to an heir the value of the properties and the share of fruits due have been determined and are detailed in technical reports the judge has ordered the plaintiffs and defendants to make the necessary adjustments as identified in the report additionally the judge has ordered possessors of the properties to release the allocated share to others finally the judge has ruled that the costs of the proceedings will be compensated this decision was made on january 26 2018 in naples
